reviewText: When I'm having a down in the dumps day this DVD is my pick me up. I don't like all of the songs but most of them. They have me clapping, dancing, singing and stomping. The songs just give the right messages at the right time. It's the post Andre Crouch gospel. Some a little to new for me.

Some good songs here. But 20 of the greatest gospel songs ever?! I don't think so! Quite a few gospel greats are included but they are not all necessarily singing their very best songs. Some really key gospel greats are not here. Would be nice to have had more artiste music videos and not so many concert excerpts, all with a 'sameness ' to the stage and set - I suspect several of the tracks are taken from the same concert/event. The sound quality is reasonable. Overall, I'd say this DVD is OK but not much better than that

I was very dispaleased with the item I order on line. When I received the tape it was loose in the case as if it was broken. The tape does not work in my cd player or any other cd player. I have ordered from you before but this is the first time this has ever happen to me.
i wouldnt mind having the dvd but i only like one song on here. so i don't think its worth the price they are asking.for $ 5.10
I found out I don't really like "gospel".  I like the contemporary christian music much better.  Nothing wrong with the quality of the cd or the music though - it's just not my style.

They dvd is all the words that could be said.  These are all number one hits that gets you up and singing.  Some are old school gospel that you may have forgotten about.  I highly recommend this to be added to your collection.  Very quality music videos and performances.
